trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Ashburn
There was one other sighting in Ashburn on or around June 26th 2008
Summary: black oval changing direction over 4 times high speed(caught on video)
divs: Sighting Detailsturning on to the harvest green terrace (where I live) noticed in corner of eye black oval moving up and down in the distance ,pulled out camera instantly thought it was a plane however no visable wings, my daughter said its a bird daddy , then it changed direction and zipped over to a diferent spot in the sky then again, then 1 zig zag then proceeded to act simalar to a plane a fly out of sight slow and controled. approx 40 seconds of video taken
